data.title: Warm Cozy Charming 2BD/2Bath GalataTower Gem! #256
data.text:
The Home

Welcome to our beautiful bright Galata home tucked away by the mesmerizing gorgeous famous touristic Galata Tower! Our beautiful home is situated in the heart of Galata! Close to all the touristic attractions, coffee shops and restaurants. Comes with a fully equipped kitchen, two modern bathrooms and 2 spacious bedrooms. Enjoy a dining table for friends and family to gather around. A spacious living room with Netflix and Wifi. Comes with A/C. The perfect home away from home for you to enjoy!

Check out: 11am / Check in: 3pm

- Please be respectful of neighbors and colleagues in the building.

- Smoking is not permitted indoors. If smoking has been detected inside our home, there will be a $100 USD penalty charge

- If you lose your keys there will be a surcharge of $25

Home Truths:

- Both bedrooms have AC

- Living room doesnâ€™t have AC but a ventilator on the ceiling

- Baby crib and high chair...
